5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ja’far bin ‘Amr bin Huraith that his father said:“I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) delivering the sermon on the pulpit, wearing a black turban.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the sermon on Friday
